title: Flower
lyrics:
Dalkomhan neoui nunbich-i naleul
Kkomjjag mos hage mandeulgo iss-eo (nega nal)
Sumgil su eobs-eo neol bon sungan nan
Neukkim-i wa
(neol bomyeon nae gaseum-i tteollyeowa)

Sinbiloun neol balabomyeonseo

Hollin deus ppajyeodeul-eo ganeun na (nega nal)

Nuga naleul jom mallyeojwo jebal

Sum-i maghyeowa

(neol bomyeon nae gaseum-i tteollyeowa)



Budeuleoun ne sumgyeol nal michige hae

Nege ppajyeodeul-eo



Neon machi Flower

Ne nunbich-i neomu aleumdawo

Nunbusin Flower

Neoui hyang-gilo nae mam-eul gadwo

Nunbusin neoui ileum-eun

Flower



Wo-eoeoeoeo nal salojab-eun neoya

Wo-eoeoeoeo nunbusin neoui ileum-eun Flower

Wo-eoeoeoeo nae kkeolo mandeulgeoya

Sinbiloun ne nunbich-eun (aleumdaun du nun-eun)

Flower



Neoleul bon sungan du nun-i majuchyeo

Nal gaman an dwo neoman tteoollige

Neogs-eul ilh-eo ne hyang-gie chwihaeseo nan

(neol bomyeon nae gaseum-i tteollyeowa)

Budeuleoun ne sumgyeol nal michige hae

Nege ppajyeodeul-eo



Neon machi Flower

Ne nunbich-i neomu aleumdawo

Nunbusin Flower

Neoui hyang-gilo nae mam-eul gadwo

Nunbusin neoui ileum-eun

Flower



Neoui ibsul-i

Nal heundeullige hae eojileobhige hae

Neoui sumgyeol-i naegelo

Seumyeodeulgo issneunde



Neon machi Flower

Ne nunbich-i neomu aleumdawo

Nunbusin Flower

Neoui hyang-gilo nae mam-eul gadwo

Nunbusin neoui ileum-eun

Flower



Wo-eoeoeoeo nal salojab-eun neoya

Wo-eoeoeoeo nunbusin neoui ileum-eun Flower

Wo-eoeoeoeo naekkeolo mandeul geoya

Sinbiloun ne nunbich-eun

(aleumdaun du nun-eun) Flower

(nunbusin neoui ileum-eun) Flower

(sinbiloun neoneun)

Flower
